author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Sunday announced solatium to families of 29 persons who died of various reasons between July and October last year.

She announced a solatium of Rs. three lakh to the kin of those who were electrocuted, and Rs. one lakh to the families of those who died of other incidents from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund.

While eight employees of Tangedco died on duty, another six died of electrocution.

A total of 10 persons died of natural disasters last year, another five died in accidents.
title: Solatium announced
